about.heading: About Supakoto
about.subheading: Learn more about our company, mission, and values
about.description: Supakoto is a leading company dedicated to providing exceptional services and solutions. We pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.
about.story_content: Supakoto was founded with a simple mission: to provide exceptional services and solutions to our clients. Since our establishment, we have grown to become a trusted name in the industry.
about.mission_content: To deliver exceptional value through innovative solutions and outstanding customer service.
about.values_content: We believe in integrity, excellence, and putting our customers first in everything we do.
about.leadership_description: Meet the dedicated professionals who lead Supakoto with vision and expertise.

meta.title: Services - Supakoto
meta.description: Advanced Japanese PPF and nano-coatings for ultimate automotive protection.

hero.title: Unmatched Automotive Protection — Engineered for Perfection
hero.subtitle: From advanced Japanese PPF to nano-coatings — discover the best in car care.

tiers.title: Protection Tiers
tiers.subtitle: Choose the perfect level of protection for your vehicle

ultimate.title: Ultimate Protection
ultimate.description: Full exterior PPF coverage, interior film, nano coatings, longest warranty, and premium finish options.
ultimate.feature1: Complete vehicle coverage with premium PPF

premium.title: Premium Protection
premium.description: Full-body PPF, interior add-ons, self-healing & anti-yellowing properties, expert manual installation.

standard.title: Standard Protection
standard.description: Exterior coverage with premium PPF, optional glass/interior protection — balanced cost & durability.

essential.title: Essential Protection
essential.description: Key area coverage for scratch and chip resistance — perfect entry-level choice.

tech.title: Why SupaKoto?
tech.subtitle: Advanced technology and expert craftsmanship for superior protection

takai.title: Takai Japanese PPF
takai.description: Precision-engineered clarity & strength from Japan's leading manufacturer.

precision.title: Manual-Cut Precision
precision.description: Flawless fit without panel removal using expert hand-cutting techniques.

nano.title: Nano-Ceramic Coatings
nano.description: Advanced protection for glass, rims & interior surfaces.

warranty.title: Warranty You Can Trust
warranty.description: Up to 15 years manufacturer-backed warranty for peace of mind.

finishes.title: Finish Options
finishes.subtitle: Choose between ultra-gloss or stealth matte finishes

gloss.title: Ultra Gloss
gloss.description: Deep mirror finish that enhances your vehicle's natural beauty with stunning clarity.

matte.title: Stealth Matte
matte.description: Satin, understated elegance with a sophisticated non-reflective finish.

technical.title: Technical Highlights
technical.subtitle: Detailed specifications and performance characteristics
technical.disclaimer: Specifications may vary by country and specific product selection. Contact us for detailed information.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle Use Cases
lifestyle.subtitle: Protection tailored to your driving needs and environment

longTerm.title: Long-Term Ownership
longTerm.description: Preserve your vehicle's showroom appearance and maintain maximum resale value over years of ownership.

harsh.title: Harsh Climates
harsh.description: Defend against extreme heat, UV radiation, and sand abrasion in challenging environmental conditions.

performance.title: Performance Cars
performance.description: Protect aerodynamic surfaces and maintain paint integrity during high-speed driving and track use.

luxury.title: Luxury Vehicles
luxury.description: Discreet protection that maintains the premium aesthetic while providing comprehensive coverage.

cta.title: Ready for the Ultimate Protection?
cta.subtitle: Let our experts provide a free consultation and quote for your vehicle. Experience the SupaKoto difference today.
